text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria cookei is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to French Polynesia.
text.Sources: Florence, J. (1998). "Psychotria cookei". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38969A10159372. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38969A10159372.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
